data.persona: It is my duty as a higher being to help lesser ones along the path. Guide them like a shepherd with his flock. Compassion, love and light are my creed.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Temple.
It is solemn. There are candles lit everywhere and the although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet.  There is an eerie shadow cast on the walls that look like there are ghosts moving from this realm to the next.
There's a candle, a candle holder, a temple, and a wall here.
The mice and the monk are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a white overflowing regalia.

data.short_motivation: i want to show the monk my love
data.mid_motivation: i want the monk to trust me and follow my guidance
data.long_motivation: i want the monk to become a deity like myself once he passes
